While the documents do not explicitly detail William P. George's role or significance, his name appears in materials related to the FBI's interactions with the SSC during its investigation. The documents suggest that the FBI was monitoring individuals contacted by the SSC, implying that William P. George may have been a person of interest to the FBI or the SSC in relation to intelligence activities.
